target: STAGE_1, make sure that the FACILITY_1 is clean and clear of tools and other i terns.

target: STAGE_1, remove safety clips and tags and close FACILITY_1.

target_txt: test stage, remove the safety clips and tags and close the circuit breakers opened in para. 2. a . (4) .

target: STAGE_1, remove the safety clips and tags and close the FACILITY_1 opened.
target_txt: test stage, remove the safety clips and tags and close the circuit breakers opened.

target: STAGE_1, oxygen storage cylinder (5750 hm) FACILITY_1 (refer to amm 35-11-41, p. block 401).
target_txt: test stage, oxygen storage cylinder (5750 hm) installation (refer to amm 35-11-41, p. block 401).

target: STAGE_1, remove the FACILITY_1 from the aft cargo compartment.
target_txt: test stage, remove the access platform from the aft cargo compartment.

target_txt: test stage, remove the safety clips and tags and close these circuit breakers:

target: STAGE_1, after the FACILITY_1 of the skin temperature sensor, do an operational test (refer to amm 21-26-13, p. block 501).
target_txt: test stage, after the installation of the skin temperature sensor, do an operational test (refer to amm 21-26-13, p. block 501).

target: STAGE_1, install the lining of the captain and first officer consoles 101vu and 700vu in zones 211 and 212, the mask FACILITY_1 and the stowage FACILITY_1.

target_txt: test stage, to torque threaded components refer to amm 20-21-12.
